content:
Can someone help me find a page I once saw describing the CESM LENS Output variables, along with their dimensions? I want to quickly understand which variables have Z levels and which do not.

This page shows variables, but their dimensions are not listed:

www.cesm.ucar.edu/projects/community-projects/LENS/data-sets.html

For the data previously sent to AWS, the table on this page indicates which variables are 3D:
https://doi.org/10.26024/wt24-5j82

Good reminder, but in this case I am looking for 2D variables to add to the AWS listing.

It may have been this page for CESM2 LENS2. Is it safe to assume that the variables and dimensions for LENS1 are unchanged here?

http://www.cesm.ucar.edu/projects/community-projects/LENS2/variable-list/

Apparently LENS1 and LENS2 variables can be different. Gary Strand just pointed me to this page, which I believe contains the information I need:

http://www.cgd.ucar.edu/ccr/strandwg/LENS1_LENS2_output/
